verses.roman:
jaya jaya nityānanda caitanya-jīvana
jayādvaitācārya jaya gaura-priyatama

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; nityānanda—to Lord Nityānanda; caitanya-jīvana—the life of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jaya—all glories; advaita-ācārya—to Advaita Ācārya; jaya—all glories; gaura-priya-tama—very, very dear to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: All glories to Lord Nityānanda, who is Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's very life. And all glories to Advaita Ācārya, who is extremely dear to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
